alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 05 at 2:18AM MST until March 05 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting gusting 25 to 40 MPH. * WHERE...The Arco Desert, Island Park region, Teton Valley, Big Hole Mountains, Caribou Range, and Bear River Range, including but not limited to Tom Cat Summit, Craters of the Moon, Idaho National Laboratory, Telegraph Hill, Mud Lake, Island Park, Ashton Hill, Ashton, Tetonia, Driggs, Victor, Pine Creek Pass, Swan Valley, Wayan, Georgetown Summit, and Emigration Summit. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Although active snowfall will be ending for most areas this morning, winds will be increasing. Be prepared for continued slick roads and pockets of blowing and drifting snow across highways.
info.instruction: If you will be driving, slow down, use extra caution, and plan extra time to reach your destination. The latest highway conditions are available at 511.idaho.gov, the Idaho 511 App, or by calling 511.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley
